properties.relation_1: Jean Laurent |(French, 1816-1886) and his studio |View of the Alc치zar and the Cathedral of Toledo from Fuencisla|, ca. 1870|Madrid, Instituto de Patrimonio Cultural de Espa침a| The similarities between Laurent's view and Lawson's landscape are as striking as their differences.  The photographer used  the point of view very similar to one inferred from the landscape. We can see, however, that Lawson changes the scale, making the cathedral belltower seem much higher. The Alc치zar, still in ruins at the time of the photograph, was restored in the early 20th century.| https://mam.org/images/artist-travellers/Lawson,%20Segovia/Laurent%20Segovia%20IPCE.jpg
